name: Red ?Squares?
description: I have taken inspiration from Vera Moln√°r squares, but I have experimted with hourglasses. One hourglass is perfectly straight, and on top of it, there is a an asymmetric one.

name: Spiral
description: While trying to figure out different grids, I have realized that I can put the squares in a spiral. It's also interactive, as you can place the center of the spiral anywhere on the canvas

name: Grid
description: Also another experiment of grids I have discovered while trying to make the spiral :). You can click it to change its color.

name: Clouds
description: Using the noise function I have represented some purple clouds in layers

name: Liquid thread
description: I wanted to see what I can do with the noise function that also moves, and I have represented a 'liquid thread'. It's mimicking an ink ripple.

name: Meteor
description: I liked the idea of multiple centers of gravity, so here it is. 'The meteor' leaves a trail behind it so you can see the path it took and which gravity center it gravitated around. You can also click to reset the meteor to the mouse's position.

name: Musical Hands
description: Here you can play music by tapping a square with your index finger. It's like a digital instrument :)
